page.title: 08Cable & Wireless, St. Levan
page.content: On 1st July 1985 I visited Porthcurno Cable & Wireless Ltd. with some others to get information for the Domesday Project.{In 'The Tunnel'}the first room we came to was the television room. We were allowed to play with some levers and also with some video camera's. Next we went to a small {museum with early wireless and cable {equipment}in it. We went through a door at the other end of the museum and a man showed us{the fire escape {that leads up 119 steps through the {hill.}We came out on the top of the hill and went up on top of a concrete platform.{You could see for miles around. As we went down the steps they were very slippery. Andrew was trying to go down them too fast and he slipped down about 3 stairs. Last of all we went to the office where there were two computers and a printer.
